version_description: • You asked, we answered - the inbox and call log are now showing fewer ads

• Search for messages within your inbox
• Nipped some crashes in the bud

• Calling over a poor connection? You're gonna have a better time
• Simplified user interface
• Search for animated GIFs using Gfycat!
• Bug fixes, y'know, for kids

• Check out our new Top-Up tab and start making phone calls today!
• Signing up for a new account has never been easier
• Fixes for a couple theme-related bugs
• Keep your streak alive on our new "Top Up" tab!
• Need credit? No problem! Just watch more rewarded video
• Be your own accountant – you can now view all new credit additions and subtractions from your balance!
• Exchange your hard-earned credit for unique offers – visit the new Credit Swap feature in our MORE menu

• Notable reductions in data consumption
• Streamlined user experience, especially when composing messages

• Fixed an issue that prevented voicemail from loading correctly
• Made it even easier to sign up for a new account
• Find out about new features at the top of our "More" menu
• A fix to resolve issues that were causing network calls across the board to fail – upon upgrading you may need to force-quit the app and/or uninstall & reinstall

• Some solid bug fixes that arose over the holidays
• Video MMS is here ‒ long live video messaging!
• Sending Video MMS on iPad devices should now work ‒ sorry about that!

• Fixed some iPad crashes
• Better handling of video MMS messages

• Get notified in style with brand new messaging alert sounds!
• Conversations have been updated to look more like native iOS
• Sending Video MMS on iPad devices should now work ‒ sorry about that!
• Bug fixes ‒ yada yada yada ‒ you know the drill
• Rewarded videos are now even better ‒ more videos, fewer problems!
• Fixed some notable crashes
• Improved performance
• Continued improvements to the app's launch time and overall responsiveness
• Improved load and response times
• Visit the Top-Up tab and start earning credit by demoing cool new games
• Phone calls will now automatically reconnect when switching from WiFi to cellular data (or vice versa!)
• We opened the hood up and tuned the engine a bit
• Improved performance for users with large message histories
• Now even better at helping you earn a balance to place a phone call
• Performance improvements
• Improved app performance

Image Filters!
Bug fixes:
- Fixed issue when adding email
- Fixed an issue some users experienced shortly after launching
• More bug fixes
• Performance improvements
• Just some tiny fixes, that's all
• Some small improvements here and there
• Bug fixes
• Performance improvements
• We've updated the advertising functionality to improve your textPlus experience
• Performance improvements
• More bug fixes
• Made some improvements to our email verification flow in order to help users set a password recovery option
• Updates to our telephone number acquisition flow

Image Filters!
Bug fixes:
- Fixed issue when adding email
- Fixed an issue some users experienced shortly after launching
Holiday Bug Fixes!
- Minor bug fixes and stability improvements

- Swipe right to clear unread items
- Bug Fixes

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a crash for users using iOS 13

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a crash some users experience when launching the application
- Fixed a crash some users experience when calling
- Fixed a crash users experience when calling their own textPlus number
- General stability improvements

Chat Customization!!!
- You can now customize each conversation with a background image of your choosing.

We've super-charged Earning
- More videos at your fingertips get you more credits to swap and call with.

- We've added even more power to earning
- Reduced some network usage on startup

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a crash for users using iOS 13

- Fixed an issue making it difficult to earn calling with no credit on iPad
- Few other minor bug fixes

- Made it easier to share your feedback
- Fixed an issue on launch that affected performance
- Minor bug fixes and stability improvements

- Swipe right to clear unread items
- Bug Fixes
- Fixes for iOS 13

- Fixed issue that caused some outbound MMS to not reach its recipient
- Stability fixes
- Reduced network usage
- Face ID or Touch ID enabled for new logins/signups - Never enter your password again!

- Big time stability improvements
- Fixed an issue where the "Get Phone Number" button would sometimes become untappable
- Performance and stability improvements
Holiday Bug Fixes!

* iOS 13 Support
* Updated the TopUp tab UI to be a little more welcoming to new users
* Added more rewarded video partners so you can earn more and pay less!
* Bug fixes
- Fixes an issue that causes some incoming calls to not be reported on iOS 13

- Earning while texting is easier than ever with the new rewarded video reminder! (Can be disabled in Settings)
- Improved password strength indicator on Sign Up.
- Fixed sizing of in-app message notifications on devices with a top bezel.
- Bug fixes.

- Fixes an issue that sometimes causes a crash when receiving a call on iOS 13
- Fixes an issue that caused Gfycat to stop loading and sometimes crash the app
- Optimized file I/O for better performance
- Made improvements to memory-intensive processing which should lead to more stability
- Fixed a few crashes related to messaging
- Fixed an intermittent crash on iPad when switching conversations

- Fixes an issue that sometimes causes a crash when receiving a call on iOS 13
- Fixes an issue that caused Gfycat to stop loading and sometimes crash the app
- Optimized file I/O for better performance
- Made improvements to memory-intensive processing which should lead to more stability
- Fixed a few crashes related to messaging
- Fixed an intermittent crash on iPad when switching conversations

- Fixes an issue that sometimes causes a crash when receiving a call on iOS 13
- Fixes an issue that caused Gfycat to stop loading and sometimes crash the app
- Optimized file I/O for better performance
- Made improvements to memory-intensive processing which should lead to more stability
- Fixed a few crashes related to messaging
- Fixed an intermittent crash on iPad when switching conversations
- Fixed an intermittent crash when inviting friends to use textPlus

- Fixed a thread lock that caused slow load times on a fresh launch, and sometimes even caused crashes
- New an improved consent options for all territories
- Fixed threading issue which caused some application instability.

- Fix deep-links
- Fix potential crash when receiving a call while on a call
- Updates to Ad SDKs for Privacy improvements

- More stability improvements
- A few ad network updates
- Fixed an issue that causes some failed transactions to not be retried automatically
- We have a NEW Offerwall! Now with 2X more ways to earn Credits. Stay connected with friends and family this year without breaking the bank.

- Fixed an issue causing some users problems with inbound and outbound calls.
- More clearly and consistently communicate calling errors to users

- Fix a crash when tapping on some links in a chat
- Other fixes and optimizations

- Fix an issue on iOS 14 that causes the app to show an incoming call screen in addition to the system banner
- Fix a threading issue causing poor performance starting an outbound calls
- Fixed a call error reporting issue
- Fixed an issue causing ads to refresh at the wrong time

- Fix an issue on iOS 14 that causes the app to show an incoming call screen in addition to the system banner
- Fix a threading issue causing poor performance starting an outbound calls
- Fixed a call error reporting issue
- Fixed an issue causing ads to refresh at the wrong time
- iOS14 Support

- Fixes a freeze when trying to use the keypad or switch audio sources while on a call
- iOS14 Support

Features:
- Conversations now load Memoji instead of showing a download link
Bug Fixes:
- Fixes an issue causing some users to not receive inbound call notifications
- Fixes an issue where some calls do not cleanup, causing the OS call to remain active but with no in-app call screen
- Fixes an issue that sometimes affected the ability to answer a call while on a call
- Fixes crashes experienced on early versions of iOS 14. Please update to the latest OS for the best experience!
- Fixes video playback in fullscreen
- Other stability improvements
Plus all of these recent updates:
- Fixes a freeze when trying to use the keypad or switch audio sources while on a call
- iOS14 Support

- Update Number selection screen on iPad, which had issues
- fixed an issue that showed "(null)" mobile number label on call history
- fix a translation bug that showed French when the language is Spanish
- fix a crash when Registration fails
- fix an issue causing some numbers to show the wrong Country in the dialer
- crash fixes

- Stability Improvements
- Update Number selection screen on iPad, which had issues
- fixed an issue that showed "(null)" mobile number label on call history
- fix a translation bug that showed French when the language is Spanish
- fix a crash when Registration fails
- fix an issue causing some numbers to show the wrong Country in the dialer
- Stability Improvements

- Fixed an issue that caused some users to no get rewards for watching videos
- Fixed some UI alignment issues that may have made some text hard to read

- Download and share voicemails with a single tap!
- You can now listen to voicemails with hardware mute on
- Fixed an issue caused the pin verification screen to not dismiss automatically
- Other stability and bug fixes

- Download your Message History with a single tap!
- Improvements to the number selection flow
- Bug fixes

- It's now easier than ever to create an account using Sign in with Apple.
- Delete your account from Settings
- Fixes for Download My Data
- Stability Improvements
